com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowVarianceBuilderType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KLightSphereBuilderType, KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowBuilderType

    public interface KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowVarianceBuilderType
extends KLightSphereBuilderType, KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowBuilderType
